wikipedia_page.main: Craig Molloy (born 26 April 1986) is a Scottish footballer and manager who plays as a midfielder for, and co- manages Greenock High School FP, in the Central Scotland Amateur Football League. “Tiger” - Well known for winning fouls with his fat arse, has found some goal scoring form in his latter years, despite being a XXXL short size. He has described GHSFP as being the best run club he’s played for proclaiming: “every day is Christmas Day at this club man it’s pyoor brulliant so it is”
